member.name: T:LablabBean.Plugins.Rendering.Terminal.TerminalRenderingPlugin
member.summary: Terminal rendering plugin that provides ISceneRenderer for Terminal.Gui.

member.name: T:LablabBean.Plugins.Rendering.Terminal.TerminalSceneRenderer
member.summary: Terminal.Gui implementation of ISceneRenderer. Renders glyph-based TileBuffers to a Terminal.Gui view, or uses Kitty graphics protocol for high-quality image rendering.

member.name: T:LablabBean.Plugins.Rendering.Terminal.TerminalSceneRendererBinding
member.summary: Binding implementation that connects TerminalSceneRenderer to the UI plugin.
